author: @MsSha67
text: You seem to be encouraging me.   Can you guide me ? I am above 50 years old - I have Master degrees in Business Administration and Statistics . I have also done  programming at the initial stage of my career and had been working in the ICT area. Recently I have acquired knowledge of ML with Python. I wonder why I didnt think about being a data scientist earlier ! Anyway I want to be one one now - almost at the fang end of my career.. I have worked in the Middle East and India and in the UK for only 1 year after MBA.  I am a very fast learner . Can anyone help me in getting data scientist or analyst or business analyst job anywhere in the world? I know my age maybe a negative point but then I have vast experience of working in different business area.
